## fastSliderLabel variable

A function that returns a [SliderLabel](./fast-foundation.sliderlabel.md) registration for configuring the component with a DesignSystem. Implements [sliderLabelTemplate](./fast-foundation.sliderlabeltemplate.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fastSliderLabel: (overrideDefinition?: import("@microsoft/fast-foundation").OverrideFoundationElementDefinition<{
    baseName: string;
    baseClass: typeof FoundationSliderLabel;
    template: import("@microsoft/fast-foundation").FoundationElementTemplate<import("@microsoft/fast-element").ViewTemplate<FoundationSliderLabel, any>, import("@microsoft/fast-foundation").FoundationElementDefinition>;
    styles: import("@microsoft/fast-foundation").FoundationElementTemplate<import("@microsoft/fast-element").ElementStyles, import("@microsoft/fast-foundation").FoundationElementDefinition>;
}> | undefined) => import("@microsoft/fast-foundation").FoundationElementRegistry<{
    baseName: string;
    baseClass: typeof FoundationSliderLabel;
    template: import("@microsoft/fast-foundation").FoundationElementTemplate<import("@microsoft/fast-element").ViewTemplate<FoundationSliderLabel, any>, import("@microsoft/fast-foundation").FoundationElementDefinition>;
    styles: import("@microsoft/fast-foundation").FoundationElementTemplate<import("@microsoft/fast-element").ElementStyles, import("@microsoft/fast-foundation").FoundationElementDefinition>;
}, typeof SliderLabel>
```

## Remarks

Generates HTML Element: `<fast-slider-label>`
